name: bumpy-road-love2d
description: I feel like toying with a game engine and submitting to an Itch.io jam, namely [2021 Variety Megajam](https://itch.io/jam/variety-megajam-2021). I'm going to start with [Love2d's physics tutorial](https://love2d.org/wiki/Tutorial:Physics) code to get the feel for it and then try to make something from there.

scripts.build: mkdir -p release && npx love.js --compatibility --title "Bumpy Road" src release
scripts.zip: rm -f bumpy-road.zip; pushd release; zip -9 -r ../bumpy-road.zip *; popd
scripts.love: rm -f bumpy-road.love; pushd src; zip -9 -r ../bumpy-road.love *; popd

author: JimOfLeisure
